DOC.brief_summary: This study ass safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamic efficacy MK0773 healthy postmenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Efficacy MK0773 Healthy Postmenopausal Women ( 0773-003 )
DOC.criteria: Subject nonsurgical postmenopausal female Subject neither grossly overweight underweight height Subject good health Subject willing avoid excess alcohol strenuous physical activity study Subject agree refrain consume St. John 's Wort , grapefruit grapefruit juice study Subject significant drug allergy Subject donate blood take investigational drug another clinical trial within last 4 week Subject regular user past abuser illicit drug ( include alcohol ) Subject drink excessive amount caffeinated beverage Subject history cancer
